snippet: The group that Peter Dahlin, a Swede, helped found is the type of organization that President Xi Jinping has said is undermining the Communist Party....
abstract: Swedish citizen Peter Dahlin recounts being jailed and interrogated for 23 days by China's Ministry of State Security, spy and counterespionage agency; Dahlin and his Chinese Urgent Action Working Group are one of many foreign nonprofit organizations being targeted by Pres Xi Jinping for undermining Communist party rule; Dahlin--who maintains his group was working to develop independent judiciary--was accused of funding criminal activities harmful to national security and deported from China in January.
lead_paragraph: The group that Peter Dahlin, a Swede, helped found is the type of organization that President Xi Jinping has said is undermining the Communist Party.

headline.main: Inside China’s Secret 23-Day Detention of a Foreign Nonprofit Chief
headline.print_headline: Inside China’s Secret 23-Day Detention of a Foreign Nonprofit Chief

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Ministry of State Security of the People's Republic of China
